EM.translations["gdpr_modal_analysis_tab_text"] = "    <p>Sunt cookie-uri anonime prin care analizam date despre pagini vizualizate, traseul si actiunile utilizatorilor in site.<\/p>\n    <p>Datorita acestor cookie-uri putem evalua rezultatele de trafic online si oferi o experienta mai buna celor care acceseaza eMAG.ro. De asemenea, putem afla ce rata de deschidere au emailurile trimise catre abonati si ce recomandari de produse i-ar ajuta. Cu ajutorul acestor tehnologii:<\/p>\n    <ul>\n        <li>colectam informatii anonime despre cele mai vizitate zone<\/li>\n        <li>analizam interactiunea utilizatorilor cu site-ul si incercam s-o imbunatatim<\/li>\n        <li>urmarim succesul emailurilor trimise abonatilor.<\/li>\n    <\/ul>\n    <p>%view_more_btn%<\/p>";
EM.translations["gdpr_modal_your_preferences_tab_text"] = "<p>Cookie-uri? Probabil ai mai auzit de ele. Sunt mici fisiere text care permit salvarea setarilor si preferintelor tale atunci cand intri pe un site.<\/p>\n    <p>Le folosim pentru imbuntatirea experientei online si personalizarea continutului pe care ti-l oferim zi de zi. O parte dintre ele sunt obligatorii, cum sunt cele necesare, care ajuta la buna functionare a site-ului. In sectiunea dedicata din acest mesaj, poti selecta cookie-urile pe care le accepti.<\/p>\n    <p>Nu uita ca pe eMAG un cookie te ajuta:<\/p>\n    <ul>\n        <li>sa primesti recomandarile si ofertele potrivite<\/li>\n        <li>sa afli cand scade pretul la produsele tale Favorite<\/li>\n        <li>sa ai o buna experienta de navigare si cumparare online.<\/li>\n    <\/ul>\n    <p>Dezactivarea anumitor cookie-uri poate afecta utilizarea site-ului si a serviciilor noastre.<\/p>";

<style id="gpt-style2"></style><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/font_ro-5ba5f6e.css">

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/js/assetic/cart-557a06b.js"></script>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/js/assetic/custom_select-e3876d3.js"></script>


<script type="text/javascript">
    var site_url = "";
    var currency_code = "RON";
    var cookie_domain = "emag.ro";
    var cookie_domain_extended = ".emag.ro";
    var _sf_perf = (new Date()).getTime();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME = 'clear_local_storage';

    function clearLocalStorageExcept(exceptionsArray){
        if (!Array.isArray(exceptionsArray)){
            exceptionsArray = [];
        }
        var storageKeys = Object.keys(localStorage);
        storageKeys.forEach(function(key) {
            if (exceptionsArray.indexOf(key) >= 0){
                return;
            }
            localStorage.removeItem(key);
        });
    }


    var clearCookieExceptions = [];
    if (window.PH && window.PH.cookie && parseInt(PH.cookie.get(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        PH.cookie.set(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME,0,-1,'/',cookie_domain_extended);
    } else if (window.eCookie && parseInt(eCookie.get(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        eCookie.set({ name:CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME, value:0, path: '/', domain: cookie_domain_extended || '' });
    } else if (parseInt($.cookie(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME))) {
        clearLocalStorageExcept(clearCookieExceptions);
        $.cookie(CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE_COOKIE_NAME, 0, { path: '/', domain: cookie_domain_extended || '' })
    }

    var rcaFormTimestamp = window.localStorage.getItem("rcaFormTimestamp");
    var hrs72 = 72 * 3600 * 1000;
    if (rcaFormTimestamp && +rcaFormTimestamp + hrs72 < Date.now()) {
        // cleanup after 72 hours
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaFormTimestamp");
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaForm");
        window.localStorage.removeItem("rcaToken");
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var emagUuidCookie;
    if (window.PH && window.PH.cookie) {
        emagUuidCookie = PH.cookie.get('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }else if (window.eCookie) {
        emagUuidCookie = eCookie.get('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }else{
        emagUuidCookie = $.cookie('EMAGUUID');
        if (emagUuidCookie){
            localStorage.setItem('EMAGUUID', emagUuidCookie);
        }
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ajaxComplete(function() {
        if (window.PH && EM.dispatcher){
            PH.trigger(EM.dispatcher, "AjaxFinished");
        }
    });
</script>



<link rel="shortcut icon" href="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/favicon2.ico?v=2b">


<script type="text/javascript">
    var siteLocale = 'ro';
    var is_loggedin = typeof eUserInfo != 'undefined';
    var is_supermarket = document.location.pathname.indexOf("/supermarket") >= 0;

    function add_to_cart(queryString){
        varUrl = 'https://www.emag.ro/addtocart--' + queryString;
        $('#modify_cart').attr("action", varUrl);
        $('#modify_cart').submit();

        return true;
    }

    var search_url_prefix = '';
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="/js/general/emag_search_general.js?session_id=&amp;visitor_id=&amp;locale=ro&amp;page_type=cart&amp;enable_search_suggestions=1"></script>

    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/export-megamenu-4779191.css">





<script>
    $.ajaxSetup({
        beforeSend: function (xhr){
            var LS_EMAGUUID = localStorage.getItem('EMAGUUID');
            if (!$.cookie('EMAGUUID') && LS_EMAGUUID){
                xhr.setRequestHeader("X-UUID",LS_EMAGUUID);
            }
        }
    });
</script>                <!--[if lt IE 9]>
            <script  type="text/javascript" src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/js/assetic/html5shiv-a962459.js"></script>
            <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/ie8_fixes-662e185.css" />
        <![endif]-->

        (function() {
        dataLayer.push({
            unique_token: String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000)
        });

        console.info('DatalayerManager datalayer.track.html.twig is online');

    Emag.DatalayerManager.pushDefaultData({"loc":"567bae0f","pageType_google":"cart","pageType":"shopping_cart","event":"checkout","ecommerce":{"checkout":{"products":[{"id":69794459,"doc_id":"35443427","price":49,"quantity":1,"name":"Tigaie dubla pentru clatite, pancakes, 19 cm diametru, Aluminiu, Negru","brand":"BIG BUY","brand_id":130167,"category":"Casa, Gradina & Bricolaj\/Bucatarie & Servire\/Tigai","category_id":1126,"department":"Casa, Gradina & Bricolaj","vendor":"Life Changing Devices","resealed":0,"clearance":false,"supercategory":"Household","supercategory_id":3285,"status":"\u00cen stoc"}],"actionField":{"action":"checkout","step":1}}}});

    
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if ($("ul.payment-methods-list").length > 0) {
            $(".payment-methods").bind("change", function () {
                setTimeout(function () {
                    var payment = $("ul.payment-methods-list li.selected .line-content").attr("id");
                    if (payment) {
                        payment = payment.replace("paymentLine", "");
                    }
                    Emag.DatalayerManager.pushPaymentMethod(payment, 1);
                }, 200);
            });
        }
        
            });

            <div class="emg-fluid-header-left-col">

                    <i class="em em-burger"></i>
                </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var wishlist_products_loaded = false;
            Emag.DatalayerManager.pushData({"city":"SATU MARE","gnd":false});
    
    
    /* Add to cart csrf protection token */
    var add_to_cart_token = '<input type="hidden" name="action_token" value="b20c29037c41edc0f8f5fd7db445443cc9fe65b7" />';
    var send_sms_token = $('<input type="hidden" name="action_token" value="3ee1c17fbea8ce502d56d7d4dc2e692953ea6e36" />');
    var widget_newsletter_token = $('<input type="hidden" name="action_token" value="0d21d560980f07c566f81a6b275c8237425219b4" />');
    var cart_products = $('<input type="hidden" name="action_token" value="476c66000cb8fc3a595394aa38c61434b4b45927" />');
            var auth = 0;
    
            window.user_labels = [];
    
    $(document).ready(function() {
                $('.emag-anniversary-progress-mask').css('width','0%');

        $("form").each(function() {
            var actionAttr  = $(this).attr('action');
            var idAttr      = $(this).attr('id');

            if(typeof actionAttr !== 'undefined' && actionAttr !== false){
                if (actionAttr.indexOf("addtocart/voucher") < 0 && (actionAttr.indexOf("addtocart") >= 0 || actionAttr.indexOf("updatecart") >= 0 || actionAttr.indexOf("removefromcart") >= 0)) {
                    $(this).append(add_to_cart_token);
                };
            }

            if(typeof idAttr !== 'undefined' && idAttr !== false){
                if (typeof idAttr !== 'undefined' && idAttr !== false && idAttr.indexOf("modify_cart") >= 0 && idAttr.indexOf("modify_cart_header") < 0) {
                    $(this).append(add_to_cart_token);
                };
            }
        });


        /*
        On first visit, show login popup indefinitely
        After the first click (flag stored in the 'loginTooltipShown' cookie), it will revert to the standard hover behaviour

        var gdprchecked = false,
            loginTooltipShown,
            loginBubbleTip = $('#emg-user-menu'),
            tooltipConfigObject = {
                trigger: 'hover',
                width: (auth == 1 ? 200 : 360),
                align: 'right',
                offset: 8,
                showOverlay: true,
                additionalClass: 'emg-fluid-my-account-tip' + (auth == 1 ? ' user-logged-in-tooltip' : ' user-not-logged-in-tooltip')
            }
        var onLoginTooltipNotShown = function(e){
            loginBubbleTip.setTrigger('hover');
            $.cookie('loginTooltipShown', true,{ path: '/' });
            loginBubbleTip.trigger('mouseleave');
            $(document).off('click', onLoginTooltipNotShown);
        };

        if (auth == 1){
            $.cookie('loginTooltipShown', true,{ path: '/' });
        }

        loginTooltipShown = $.cookie('loginTooltipShown');
        if (!loginTooltipShown){
            $(document).on('click', onLoginTooltipNotShown);
            tooltipConfigObject.trigger = 'instant';
            tooltipConfigObject.instantTriggerTimeout = 0;
            tooltipConfigObject.beforeCallbackTriggerOnce = true;
            tooltipConfigObject.instantTriggerTimeout = 30*1000;
            tooltipConfigObject.beforeCallback = function(e){
                this.setTrigger('hover');
                this.options.beforeCallback = null;
            };
        }

        loginBubbleTip.emgBubbleTip(tooltipConfigObject);
        */
        var wishlist_products_data;

        var shoppingCartUrl = '/shopping-cart', cc, cartCookie, is_new_client;
        $("#shoppingCartLink").attr('href', shoppingCartUrl);
        cc = $.cookie('cart_summary');
        if (cc) {
            cartCookie = jQuery.parseJSON(decodeURIComponent(cc));
        }

        if ( cartCookie && typeof cartCookie.b !== 'undefined' && parseInt(cartCookie.b) > 0 ) {
            $(".emg-cart-bubble").text(cartCookie.b).show();
            $("#header .cart").addClass("cart-notification");
            $(".cartToggler").attr("href",shoppingCartUrl);
        }

        is_new_client = $.cookie('cart_summary');

        if ( typeof is_new_client !== 'undefined' ) {
            shoppingCartUrl = shoppingCartUrl + '?reset=1';
        }
        $("#shoppingCartLink").attr('href', shoppingCartUrl);

        try {

	        var question_add = [];
	        question_add.push('scrie intrebarea si logheaza-te pentru a o publica');
			question_add.push( 'scrie o intrebare ...');


	        $('#questions_add').attr('placeholder', question_add[auth]);

	        reviews_f(auth);

	        var review_show_m = [];
			review_show_m.push('Intra in cont');
			review_show_m.push('continua');
			$('#review_show_m').html(review_show_m[auth]);

			var review_add_com = [];

			review_add_com.push('scrie comentariul si logheaza-te pentru a-l publica');
			review_add_com.push('scrie comentariul ...');
			$('.review_comment').attr('placeholder', review_add_com[auth]);


			var review_add_com_but = [];
			review_add_com_but.push('Intra in cont');
			review_add_com_but.push('publică');
			$('.review_add_com_but').html(review_add_com_but[auth]);

			var review_add_com_answer = [];

			review_add_com_answer.push('scrie raspunsul si logheaza-te pentru a-l publica');
			review_add_com_answer.push('scrie raspunsul ...');
			$('.review_comentariu_raspunde input').attr('placeholder', review_add_com_answer[auth]);
    }
    catch(err) {

    }

        if(!auth) {
            $('.wLoginLnk').css('display', 'table-cell');
        }

    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
        EM.gdpr_consent = 0;
    var products_bought_without_review_module = 1;
    var add_directly_to_cart_only_www = 0;
    var matching_notifications = 1;

</script>
<script id="cookie-consent-render-esi-script">
var EM = EM || {};

EM.cookie_policy = {"cookies":[{"id":5,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"insr","description":"Utilizat pentru detaliile de c\u0103l\u0103torie ale utilizatorului.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":6,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"travel_data","description":"Utilizat pentru detaliile de c\u0103l\u0103torie ale utilizatorului.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":11,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"emag_click_id","description":"Utilizat pentru afilierea cu afi\u0219\u0103ri a unei notific\u0103ri.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":14,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"loginTooltipShown","description":"Utilizat pentru limitarea num\u0103rului de afi\u0219\u0103ri a notific\u0103rii de autentificare.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":15,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"EMAGROSESSID","description":"Utilizat pentru a \u021bine utilizatorul logat.","type":"Functional","type_id":1},{"id":16,"is_accepted":true,"is_mandatory":true,"name":"EMAG_VIEW","description":"Diferen\u021biaz\u0103 afi\u0219area                 <script>!function(){"use strict"
var e=window.EM.cookie_policy.cookies.find(function(e){return"Google Doubleclick"===e.name})
if(!e||!e.is_accepted){var t=Array.from(document.styleSheets).find(function(e){return"gpt-style2"===e.ownerNode.id})
t&&t.insertRule(".gpt-slot { display: none }",0)}}(),function(){"use strict"
window.googletag=window.googletag||{cmd:[]},googletag.cmd.push(function(){googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotRenderEnded",function(e){var t=e.slot,o=t.getSlotElementId(),n=document.getElementById(o)
if(n){var i=PH.closest(n,".gpt-slot")
switch(EM.page_type){case"category":case"label":case"resealed":case"search":case"subdepartment_catalog":if(["tpb_product_main","RvBanner_CautareTop"].includes(o)&&i&&e.isEmpty)return void PH.addClass(i,"hide")
break
case"subdepartment":if("tpb_subdepartments_top"===o&&i){if(e.isEmpty)return
var s=i.offsetHeight
i.nextElementSibling.style.cssText="transform: translateY("+s+"px); padding-bottom: "+s+"px",i.style.removeProperty("visibility")}}if(!e.isEmpty){var a=PH.q("iframe",n)
a&&PH.on(a,"load",function(e){e.target.style.minHeight="1px"})}}})})}()
</script></div>
            <div id="emg-fluid-overlay" data-statuson="false"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="emg-top-margin"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    /* <![CDATA[ */
    var header_notices_loaded = false;
    var header_cart_loaded = false;
    var header_cart_nr_products = 0;
    var PICTURESURL = '';
    var SITE_LINK = '';
    var SITE_LINK_SECURE = 'https://www.emag.ro/';
    var SITE_LINK_PROTOCOL = 'https://www.emag.ro/';
    var flancoPoints = '';
    /* ]]> */

    jQuery(document).ready(function(){
        if ( $.cookie("profile_token") === null ) {
            var currTime = new Date();
            str = currTime.getTime() + '' + Math.random();
            str = str.split('').sort(function(){return 0.5-Math.random()}).join('');
            str = 'pftk_' + str.substring(0,20).replace('.', '');
            $.cookie("profile_token", str, { path: '/', domain: '.emag.ro', expires: 30 });
        }
    });
</script>

        <script type="text/html" id="template-upsell-genius-modal">

    <div class="ajax-loader">
        <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="">
        <span>se incarca...</span>
    </div>
</div>
        	<script>
        siteLocale = 'ro';

        var Cart = Cart || {};

    (function(Cart) {
        var config = {};
        config.lang = 'ro';

        config.urls = {
            getAddressEditForm: '/cart/ajax-address-edit',
            getBillingEditForm: '/cart/ajax-billing-edit',
            saveForm: '/cart/ajax-save-form',
            addDonation: '/cart/add-donation',
            addOffer: '/newaddtocart',
            updateAction: '/cart/update',
            addExtra: '/cart/add-extra',
            removeAction: '/cart/remove',
            undoAction: '/cart/undo',
            saveLineCartForLaterAction: '/cart/save-line-cart-for-later',
            saveForLater: '/cart/save-for-later',
            addVoucher: '/cart/add-voucher',
            removeVoucher: '/cart/remove-voucher',
            refreshVouchers: '/cart/refresh-vouchers',
            getTotalsAction: '/cart/get-totals',
            getSpecialDelivery: '/cart/get-special-delivery',
            getSmSchedule: '/cart/get-sm-schedule',
            getSmPoints: '/cart/get-sm-points',
            getSmDeliveryTypes: '/cart/get-pickup-types',
            getShowroomInfo: '/cart/get-showroom-info',
            getNotifications: '/cart/get-notifications',
            getEmptyCart: '/cart/get-empty',
            getUserLocalities: '/user/localities/locId',
            addressDetails: '/cart/ajax-address-details',
            getProductAccessories: '/ajax-product-categories-accessories/pid',
            getInstallments      : '/cart/get-installments/',
            removeToken          : '/user/remove-token',
            recheckWeekendDelivery : '/cart/recheck-weekend-delivery',
            setLoyaltyPoints : '/cart/set-loyalty-points'
        };

        config.translations = {
            free: 'GRATUIT',
            invalidZip: 'Cod Postal invalid',
            postalCode: 'Cod postal',
            supermarketDeliveryTimeRequired: 'Te rugam sa alegi un interval de livrare pentru produsele din supermarket',
            invalidLoyaltyPointsLower: 'Te rugam adauga numarul de puncte.',
            invalidLoyaltyPointsUpper: 'Nu ai acumulat suficiente puncte.',
            noResults: 'Nu s-au gasit rezultate',
            selectCityFirst: 'Vă rugăm să alegeți județul',
            selectShowroom: 'Selecteaza',
            products: '%count% produs|%count% produse|%count% de produse',
            noPaymentMethods: 'Din cauza restrictiilor de plata asociate produselor din cosul tau, nu exista nicio metoda de plata activa. Te rugam <a href="/cart/products">sa te intorci in cos</a> si sa plasezi comenzi separate pentru fiecare partener certificat Marketplace.',
            shippingExtraTax: '<strong>INFO</strong>: Livrarea la aceasta adresa include o taxa suplimentara de [tax_value].',
            favorite: 'favorit',
            recommended: 'recomandat',
            pickupPoints: {
                'all': 'Toate optiunile',
                'personal': 'Showroom eMAG',
                'rapido-office': 'rapido-office',
                'sprinter-office': 'sprinter-office',
                'magyar-posta-office': 'magyar-posta-office',
                'inpost': 'inpost',
                'pickup-point': 'Oficii Postale',
                'posta-pl-office': 'posta-pl-office',
                'sameday-office-courier': 'eMAG easybox',
                'bulgarian-post-office': 'bulgarian-post-office'

            }
        };

        config.staticUrlSecure = 'https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/';
        config.disableMessages = "";
        config.currencyCode = 'RON';
        config.errors = [];
        config.sectionErrors = {
            shipping: 'Te rugam selecteaza adresa de livrare',
            supermarketShipping: 'Te rugam selecteaza adresa de livrare',
            billing: 'Te rugam selecteaza modalitatea de facturare',
            payment: "Selecteaza metoda de plata pentru a continua."
        };

        config.isEligibleForVatReverse = false;
        config.paymentMethodsNames = "";
        config.isAuthenticated = false;
        config.showPersonalPickupTooltip = false;
        config.hasPersonalPickup = false;
        config.deliveryPoint = "";
        config.hasSpecialDelivery = false;
        config.showDeliveryEstimate = true;
        config.user = {
            name : '',
            phone : '',
            has_genius_benefits : false
        };
        config.estimateRetrySeconds = 2;
        config.supermarketSpecialDeliveryPoints = ["caaa637e-c5cb-11e5-84a8-001a4a8c8303"];
        config.deliveryMethods = {"DELIVERY_MODE_SHOWROOM":"showroom","DELIVERY_MODE_COURIER":"curieri","DELIVERY_MODE_SAME_DAY":"same_day","DELIVERY_MODE_SCHEDULED_DELIVERY":"scheduled_delivery","DELIVERY_MODE_COURIER_2H":"curieri 2h","DELIVERY_MODE_ELECTRONIC":"electronic","DELIVERY_MODE_PICKUP_POINT":"pickup point","DELIVERY_MODE_PICKUP_POINT_LOCKERS":"sameday-office-courier"};
        config.orderTotals = {"summary_vendors":{"74765":{"price":49,"shipping_cost":18,"additional_tax":0,"subtotal":67,"total_before_discount":18}},"summary_order":{"discount_value":0,"total_discounted_value":49,"has_limited_stock_products":false,"shipping_cost":18,"additional_tax":0,"payment_additional":0,"items_price":49,"total_before_discount":18,"total_price":67,"items_count":1,"loyalty_points":0},"total_discount":0,"genius_discount":null,"genius_upsell_thankyou_eligibility":false,"show_genius_upsell":false,"genius_upsell_message":"","genius_upsell_type":"","trial_upsell_token_id":null};
        config.productData = null;
        config.pickupProducts = null;
        config.vendorNames = {"74765":"Life Changing Devices"};
        config.pickupExcludeFilters = {};
        config.restrictShowroomCapacity = 0;
        config.display_extra_shipping_fee = 0;
        config.discover_pickup_points_on_map = 1;
        config.showCodFeeMessage = 0;
        config.enableEcreditForDifferentBilling = 0;
        config.cashRestrictedRegions = null;
        config.favoritePoint = '';
        config.recommendedPoint = "";
        Cart.config = config;
        Cart.getDefaultDeliveryTaxDatalayerObject = function(ea){
            ea = ea || 'load';
            var datalayerObject = [];
            for (var vendorId in Cart.config.vendorNames){
                if (!Cart.config.orderTotals.summary_vendors[vendorId]){ continue; }
                datalayerObject.push({
                    vendor_id: vendorId,
                    vendor_name: Cart.config.vendorNames[vendorId],
                    delivery_tax: parseFloat(Cart.config.orderTotals.summary_vendors[vendorId].shipping_cost)
                });
            }
            return {
                event: "checkout_delivery_information",
                ea: ea,
                vendor_information: datalayerObject
            };
        };
    })(Cart);

    $.ajaxPrefilter(function(options) {
        if (options.type.toUpperCase() == 'POST') {
            options.data = options.data || '';
            if(!options.data.match(/action_token/)) {
                options.data += '&' + $.param({action_token: '476c66000cb8fc3a595394aa38c61434b4b45927'});
            }
        }
    });
</script>
		<script>
	$(function() {

        <script>
    window.nrlskOnEvent = function (padiact) {
        if (padiact.type == 'open') {
            var padiact_urls = {
                padiact_ro_8256: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_8256-6148cca.css",
                padiact_ro_8708: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_8708-ee080a6.css",
                padiact_ro_8709: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_8709-a244be1.css",
                padiact_ro_9272: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9272-aa36e63.css",
                padiact_ro_9273: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9273-3f511cd.css",
                padiact_ro9274: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro9274-c7a34b8.css",
                padiact_ro_9275: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9275-cddfaa7.css",
                padiact_ro_9276: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9276-ae4c250.css",
                padiact_ro_9277: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9277-2c76e90.css",
                padiact_ro_9530: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_9530-e3e8e88.css",
                padiact_ro_10618: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_10618-a2ef8c6.css",
                padiact_ro_10619: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_10619-5d4cea9.css",
                padiact_ro_11113: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_11113-c188fc0.css",
                padiact_ro_11115: "https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/www/css/assetic/padiact_ro_11115-afde5e1.css"
            };
            var padiact_url = '';

            if (padiact.id == 9272) {
                padiact_url = padiact_urls['padiact_ro_' + padiact.id];
                $('<link rel="stylesheet" href="' + padiact_url + '" type="text/css" />').appendTo('head');

                if ($('.padiFormWrap ul').length > 0) {
                    // Get Exising Select Options
                    $('.padiFormWrap ul').each(function (i, ul) {
                        var $ul = $(ul);
                        var $p = $("<p/>");
                        $ul.find('label').each(function (j, label) {
                            var $label = $(label);
                            if ($label.hasClass("padiLabel")) {
                                $p.append("<label class='padiLabel'><span>" + $label.text() + "</span></label>");
                            }
                            else {
                                // Create a radio:
                                var $checkbox = $('<input type="checkbox" />');
                                // Set name and value:
                                $checkbox.attr({
                                    name: $label.children(":first").attr('name'),
                                    id: $label.children(":first").attr('id'),
                                    value: $label.children(":first").attr('value')
                                });
                                // Insert radio before select box:
                                $p.append($checkbox);
                                // Insert a label:
                                $p.append(
                                        $("<label class='optionLabel'/>").attr('for', $checkbox.attr('id')).text($label.text())
                                );
                            }
                        });
                        $ul.before($p);
                        $ul.remove();
                    });
                }
            } else {
                if (typeof padiact_urls['padiact_ro_' + padiact.id] !== 'undefined') {
                    padiact_url = padiact_urls['padiact_ro_' + padiact.id];
                    $('<link rel="stylesheet" href="' + padiact_url + '" type="text/css" />').appendTo('head');
                }
                if ($('.padiFormWrap select').length > 0) {
                    //Get Exising Select Options
                    $('.padiFormWrap select').each(function (i, select) {
                        var $select = $(select);
                        $select.find('option').each(function (j, option) {
                            var $option = $(option);
                            // Create a radio:
                            var $radio = $('<input type="radio" id="' + j + '"/>');
                            // Set name and value:
                            $radio.attr('name', $select.attr('name')).attr('value', $option.val());
                            // Insert radio before select box:
                            $select.before($radio);
                            // Insert a label:
                            $select.before(
                                    $("<label class='optionLabel'/>").attr('for', $radio.attr('id')).text($option.text())
                            );
                        });
                        $select.remove();
                    });
                }
            }
        }
    }
</script>

        <span id="compatibility-popup" style="display:none">
    <span style="position: relative; display: inline-block; width: 491px; height: 407px; background-image: url(https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/new/old-popup.png);">
        <span class="close-old-warning" style="cursor:pointer; display: inline-block; position:absolute; top: 20px; right: 15px; width: 16px; height: 16px;"></span>
        <a target="_blank" href="https://www.google.com/intl/en/chrome/browser/" style="cursor:pointer; display: inline-block; position:absolute; top: 210px; left: 60px; width: 105px; height: 100px;"></a>
        <a target="_blank" href="http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/fx/#desktop" style="cursor:pointer; display: inline-block; position:absolute; top: 210px; left: 189px; width: 105px; height: 100px;"></a>
        <a target="_blank" href="http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/internet-explorer/download-ie" style="cursor:pointer; display: inline-block; position:absolute; top: 210px; left: 323px; width: 105px; height: 100px;"></a>
        <span class="close-old-warning" style="cursor:pointer; display: inline-block; position:absolute; top: 370px; left: 141px; width: 205px; height: 20px;"></span>
    </span>
</span>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function get_browser_version(){
        var N=navigator.appName, ua=navigator.userAgent, tem;
        var M=ua.match(/(opera|chrome|safari|firefox|msie)\/?\s*(\.?\d+(\.\d+)*)/i);
        if(M && (tem= ua.match(/version\/([\.\d]+)/i))!= null) M[2]= tem[1];
        M=M? [M[1], M[2]]: [N, navigator.appVersion, '-?'];
        return parseInt(M[1]);
    }
    $(document).ready(function(){
        if ($.cookie('oldBrowserIHaveBeenWarned') != 'yes' && (($.browser.msie && get_browser_version() < 9) || ($.browser.mozilla && get_browser_version() < 3))) {
            $.blockUI({
                'message': $('#compatibility-popup'),
                'css': {
                    'cursor': 'auto',
                    'height': '407px',
                    'width': '491px',
                    'textAlign': 'left',
                    'border': 'none',
                    'backgroundColor': 'none',
                    'zIndex':9998,
                    'top': '50%',
                    'marginTop': '-203px'
                },
                'overlayCSS':  {
                    'cursor': 'auto',
                    'backgroundColor':'#e8e8e8',
                    'opacity': 0.9,
                    'zIndex':9998
                }
            });
            window.closePopUp = function() {
                $.unblockUI();
                return false;
            }

            $('.close-old-warning').on('click',function(e){
                $.cookie('oldBrowserIHaveBeenWarned','yes');
                closePopUp();
            });
            $('.blockUI.blockOverlay').click(function(){
                $.cookie('oldBrowserIHaveBeenWarned','yes');
            });
        }
    });
</script>

    </div>

            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">
                <div class="pad-hrz-xl">

                        <label class="hidden-xs text-truncate pad-btm-sm"> </label>

                        </a>
                        <input type="hidden" name="facebook_error" />
                    </div>

                        <a href="#" data-network="google" data-event="<%= google_click_event %>" class="<% if (google_disabled) { %>disabled <% } %>pho-btn btn btn-social btn-icon btn-block btn-google js-google-login">

                        </a>
                        <input type="hidden" name="google_error" />
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mrg-btm-md visible-xs"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-newsletter-separator"><span class="pad-sep-xs pad-hrz-xs">sau</span></div>

                        <input class="form-control" type="text" name="name" required="true"  data-vm-required="Acest câmp este necesar"/>

                        <button class="pho-btn btn btn-default" type="submit">Mă înscriu</button>
                    </div>

            </div>

        <p class="text-center font-size-sm text-muted mrg-sep-sm">*Te poți dezabona cu ușurință în orice moment<br/>Citește <a href="/info/termeni-si-conditii" target="_blank">termenii si conditiile</a> noastre aici</p>
    </div>
</script>        <script type="text/template" id="modal-newsletter-success-template">
<div class="modal-header">
    <h4 class="modal-title semibold">Abonare Newsletter</h4>
    <button class="close"><i class="em em-close"></i></button>
</div>
<div class="modal-body">
    <div class="modal-newsletter-subscribed">
        <p class="alert alert-success strong font-size-md" role="alert"><i class="em em-check"></i>Te-ai înscris cu succes, <%= name %></p>
        <form class="js-options-form">
            <input type="hidden" name="email" value="<%= email %>" />
            <input type="hidden" name="name" value="<%= name %>" />
            <h3 class="semibold mrg-top-none">Selectează domeniile de interes</h3>
            <p class="mrg-btm-sm">Pentru a primi cele mai relevante oferte din zonele:</p>
            <div class="js-options-wrapper mrg-btm-sm" >
                <% for (var i in subscriptions) { %>
                    <label class="btn-opt mrg-btm-xs" for="<%= subscriptions[i].label %>">
                        <input data-subscription-id="<%= subscriptions[i].id %>" id="<%= subscriptions[i].label %>" type="checkbox" name="subscriptions[<%= subscriptions[i].id %>]" autocomplete="off" <% if (subscriptions[i].status) { %>checked<% } %>><span><%= subscriptions[i].name %></span>
                    </label>
                <% } %>
            </div>
            <button type="submit" class="pho-btn btn btn-primary">Salveaza</button>
        </form>
    </div>
</div>
</script>            <script type="text/javascript" src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/assets/ro/js/ga_custom_dimensions_script.min.js"></script>
    

<iframe id="ssIFrame_google" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin" aria-hidden="true" frame-border="0" src="https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/iframe#origin=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro&amp;rpcToken=556061491.7690194&amp;clearCache=1" style="position: absolute; width: 1px; height: 1px; inset: -9999px; display: none;"></iframe><div id="fb-root" class=" fb_reset"><div style="position: absolute; top: -10000px; width: 0px; height: 0px;"><div></div></div></div><script type="text/javascript" id="">(function(){function c(b){var a=localStorage.getItem(b);a&&(a=JSON.parse(a))&&(a=a.filter(function(a){return 864E5>Date.now()-a.timestamp}),a.length?localStorage.setItem(b,JSON.stringify(a)):localStorage.removeItem(b))}c("gtm_gmv_widgets");c("DFP_sas_tracking")})();</script><script type="text/javascript" id="">(function(){var a=document.getElementById("gpt-style");a?googletag.cmd.push(function(){PH.trigger(document,"PHGPTLoaded");EM.gtpLoaded=1}):(a=document.createElement("script"),a.src="https://securepubads.g.doubleclick.net/tag/js/gpt.js",a.async=!0,a.addEventListener("load",function(){window.googletag=window.googletag||{};window.googletag.cmd=window.googletag.cmd||[];PH.trigger(document,"PHGPTLoaded");EM.gtpLoaded=1}),document.head.appendChild(a))})();</script><div class="ph-widget ph-popup navbar-drop navbar-account-dropdown my-account-dropdown-logged-out ph-dropdown-popup ph-popup-s ph-popup-e ph-popup-bottom" style="left: -10000px; top: -10000px;"><div class="ph-dropdown-inner"><div class="custom-dropdown-body">
